content:
I am trying to define the the function
def horn_from_path (X : SSet) (f : SSet.Path X 2) : Î›[2, 1].toSSet âŸ¶ X
which sends the vertices and edges of Î›[2, 1] to the vertices and edges of the path f. Is there an obvious strategy to define such a function?

In my repository, I have code doing essentially that at https://github.com/joelriou/topcat-model-category/blob/7981f135abfe3a18175ea638b2aa1d3a357786fb/TopCatModelCategory/SSet/Horn.lean#L170-L205 (this expresses this horn as a pushout, and then you can use the two edges of the path), but this code depends on ongoing pull requests to mathlib than I have mentioned at #Infinity-Cosmos > towards the homotopy category of a quasi-category @ ðŸ’¬
Thanks, I'll take a look. I figured that the PR you mentioned is probably relevant :thumbs_up:
